verbose_text: Dot plots of LINF903 and U266, representing cells transfected with the same amount of circular pEGFP-Pem1 or HindIII digested pEGFP-Pem1-Ad2 plasmids, together with pDSRed2-N1, used to correct for transfection efficiency, are shown in XREF_FIG.
evidence: amount of circular pEGFP-Pem1 or HindIII
